onboarding-title-2:
Have The History And
Parameters In Real Time
onboarding-subtitle-1:
After installing the sensors you can
see the humidity,
temperature and luminosity
parameters.
onboarding-subtitle-2:
You can have the complete history
of the pre-harvest parameters of
your orchid.
onboarding-subtitle-3:
Your orchids are being taken care of
exactly with the parameters you set.
